channel.title: GitHub Less Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Less in GitHub

item.title: jerrykuku/luci-theme-argon
item.description: Argon is a clean and tidy OpenWrt LuCI theme that allows users to customize their login interface with images or videos. It also supports automatic and manual switching between light and dark modes.

item.title: opentiny/tiny-vue
item.description: TinyVue is an enterprise-class UI component library of OpenTiny community, support both Vue.js 2 and Vue.js 3, as well as PC and mobile.
